snippet: To the photographer Neal Slavin, it is surprising how much humanity is revealed in a group portrait....
abstract: Photographer Neal Slavin says his color shots of group gatherings at tourist sites, conventions, religious ceremonies and other public events around New York City reveal intriguing glimpses into private personas of individual subjects within those groups.
lead_paragraph: To the photographer Neal Slavin, it is surprising how much humanity is revealed in a group portrait.
